name: angularity
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of having angles rather than curves: The angularity of the rocks indicates chemical weathering by the atmosphere. Angularity and flat panes are typical of this architectural style.
the quality of having or seeming to have sharp points: Her short hair accentuated the angularity of her features. See
angular
More examplesFewer examplesThese photographs of the buildings seem to emphasize the angularity of the walls.You see a lot of angularity in graffiti writing.I was struck by his good looks and the angularity of his face and body.Over the years he shifted from youthful angularity to a middle-aged roundness.
